definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: The law will also stop the backlog from growing.
sentences.chinese: 新法也會使積案不再增長。

sentences.english: Various conditionality results in increasingly growth of long-pending criminal cases.
sentences.chinese: 由於各種條件的限制，導致了刑事積案與日俱增。
